title: Montana: Big Zeit Country 12/2: Arsenal, Joe Biden, National Board of Review, MLB, Susan Sarandon, Tom Cruise
itunes:title: Montana: Big Zeit Country 12/2: Arsenal, Joe Biden, National Board of Review, MLB, Susan Sarandon, Tom Cruise
description:
In this edition of Montana: Big Zeit Country, Jack and Miles discuss, Man United v. Arsenal, Joe Biden's Covid battle plan, the National Board of Review awards, the MLB player lock-out, how everything is Susan Sarandon's fault, and Tom Cruise's most dangerous stunt yet.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
